sentences: Võõrad inimesed ei tundu olevat soovitavad.
context: The word 'võõras' is an adjective in Estonian. It can mean 'strange', 'foreign', or 'unknown'. When used to describe people, it means foreigner or stranger. The form shown is the nominative singular masculine form. In different contexts, it could refer to something unfamiliar (strange), someone from another country (foreign), or simply an unknown person (stranger).
